Items.Name: Mat
Items.LookDescription: A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies here.

Items.Name: Mailbox
Items.LookDescription: There is a small mailbox here.

Items.Name: Leaves
Items.LookDescription: There is a pile of leaves here.

Items.Name: Sword
Items.LookDescription: A shining sword lies on the ground here.

Items.Name: Apple
Items.LookDescription: A glistening red apple hangs from a short branch.
Items.EatDescription: You took a giant chomp of the apple and took out the worm inside.

Items.Name: Axe
Items.LookDescription: A sharp axe lies against a tree.

Items.Name: Orange
Items.LookDescription: A sugary orange rests on the ground, surprisingly it isn't covered in dirt.
Items.EatDescription: You peeled the orange and ate each slice.

Items.Name: Pear
Items.LookDescription: The greenest pear you've ever seen is at your feet.'
Items.EatDescription: You took a nice big bite out of the pear.

Enemies.Name: Goblin
Enemies.Description: A goblin has appeared and wants to fight you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The goblin slowly fell to the ground.

Enemies.Name: Golem
Enemies.Description: A large bulky Golem guards the top of the Rocky Pillars.
Enemies.AttackDescription: The Golem swung one of its large rock hands at you.
Enemies.DefeatDescription: The Golem disassemble into a bunch of small pebbles.

Rooms.Name: West of House
Rooms.Description: This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

Rooms.Name: North of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: South of House
Rooms.Description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are barred.

Rooms.Name: Behind House
Rooms.Description: You are behind the white house. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

Rooms.Name: Forest 1
Rooms.Description: This is a forest, with trees in all directions around you.

Rooms.Name: Forest 2
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands here.

Rooms.Name: Forest 3
Rooms.Description: This is a dimly lit forest, with large trees all around. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

Rooms.Name: Clearing
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest to the west and rocky path to the south.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Forest Entrance
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest to the west and rocky path to the south.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Pillars
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest to the west and rocky path to the south.

Rooms.Name: Rocky Pillars 2
Rooms.Description: You are in a clearing, with a forest to the west and rocky path to the south.

Rooms.Name: Top of the Pillars
Rooms.Description: Above the trees, you can see all the land including the house to the north. It feels like you're walking on a pebble carpet tho.'
